title: Celebrating Australia Day across the country
caption: Celebrating Australia Day across the country
desc: No matter where you find yourself today, there’s always plenty to do on Australia Day, and this year is no exception. If you’re in Sydney, annual firework displays across the harbour, like the ones you see today, will light up the night sky. For those in Victoria, on the other hand, why not check out the Official Flag Raising ceremony, closely followed by the Australia Day Parade – featuring more than 1000 participants from over 80 community and cultural groups.
